title.narrative: Water, Sanitation and Hygiene Recovery Activity (WRA)

description.narrative: (Nepal): USAID will improve the health and well-being of the earthquake-affected populations living in two districts, Sindhupalchowk and Dolakha. USAID will improve community water and public sanitation infrastructure; promote hygiene; and strengthen Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene governance. USAID will form or revitalize water users' committees (WUCs) to construct or renovate community based water supply systems and develop the capacity of WUCs to operate and manage these systems. USAID will also help schools and communities promote menstrual hygiene management and support improved hygiene practices.
